snippet.title: World Soccer Strikers '91 Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Welcome to the 90's, kid! Experience videogames like never before on the new 16-bit generation! Flash processing!

- Great fast paced action and incredible graphics! - It's just like playing in the arcades! 

- It's the 16 bit era of couch multiplayer, too: up to 8 players at the same time and in your own living room! That's, like, 2 bits per player, man! Raaaad!

- And there's a huge bunch of teams! Like, at least 30, or 40, or something. And there's managers that can change the team's stats. And also a bunch of game modes with tournaments and leagues and everything!

- You can even save your goal replays! My dad left mine uploading overnight from his computer at work. I'm gonna brag all week long on the Internet!

Yeah, it's the Official game for next year's 1991 Superstar Soccer Cup. What if we both pay for half and we swap it every other week?

Get them game at: https://store.steampowered.com/app/877870/World_Soccer_Strikers_91/
Console versions Q1 2021.
Developer - Bipolar Dawn
Publisher - Meteorbyte Publishing ++ 

Get them game at: https://store.steampowered.com/app/877870/World_Soccer_Strikers_91

Presskit: https://mega.nz/file/dooACA6K#9XI2wmEn7HhRYPbvKKFTBK86rAkKPhfVRmLvm1rfb9I

Join our DISCORD to get the latest news on our games: https://discord.com/invite/mbs
